creditline: Gift of funds from Maria Eggemeyer, Maria Wagner Reamer, and Therese M. Blaine in recognition of the Friends of the Institute
medium: Quills, beads, tin cones, brass sequins, thimbles, satin, calico, fabric, brass bells, feathers, elk hide
text: Bag with slightly bulbous bottom; short handle with predominantly red quillwork, trimmed with blue beads and backed with blue floral-print fabric; one side of bag has quillwork with multicolored flowers against red stripes; other side has multicolored beadwork with floral motif and maroon and yellow beadwork trim; four stripes of hide with gold thimbles and yellow, blue, and green ribbons; tin cones around edges with red feathers.
title: Floral Legacy
